title: Saving Grace
description: After wrecking her car and waking with amnesia, reporter Grace Morgan is shocked to hear she'd left the husband she loves (Police Detective Ray Morgan)for another man. It can't be true! Can it? Sheâ€™s determined to remember, even if it kills her. And it just might. When bullets start to fly, Ray is forced to take the wife he thinks faithless on the lam while he figures out who wants her dead.
author: Norah Wilson
